quote_last: :12am, Case. Got a readout chipped into my optic nerve.'
title: Neuromancer
author: William Gibson

quote_first: Max woke from the nightmare with a gasp, eyes flying open in the pitch-black room. She blinked twice and muffled a groan as the
quote_last: timestamp appeared in her vision. “You’ve never even seen a real bear,” she muttered.
title: A Pale Light in the Black
author: K.B.Wagers
